doc.title: 50 States
doc.plot: "50 States" is the story of 12-year-old Jane and her father Charlie, who must get to know each other better as they travel together on a road trip across the Midwest. Jane dreams of visiting all fifty states, but instead finds herself traveling the familiar confines of the Midwest with a father she hardly knows. As their trip draws to an end, Jane realizes she must find her own road to happiness, because growing up, there is no map.

"50 States" is the story of 12-year-old Jane and her father Charlie, who must get to know each other better as they travel together on a road trip across the Midwest. Jane dreams of visiting all fifty states, but instead finds herself traveling the familiar confines of the Midwest with a father she hardly knows. As their trip draws to an end, Jane realizes she must find her own road to happiness, because growing up, there is no map.
